patterns: What can you tell me about India
What do you know about India
What can you tell me about India
What do you know about India
responses: India, officially the Republic of India (Hindi: Bhārat Gaṇarājya),a country in South Asia.
India is the second-most populous country, the seventh-largest country by land area, and the most populous democracy in the world.

patterns: Give me some facts about India
Give me some facts about India
responses: The name ‘India’ derives from the river Indus.
India is the 7th largest country in the world.
India has the second-largest population in the world.
Thousands of languages are spoken all over India.
The national symbol of India is the endangered Bengal Tiger.
India is the second largest English speaking country in the world.
